name: Nuclear Throne
description:
Installs Nuclear Throne Together by YellowAfterlife for network Co-Op. 
Requires latest NuclearThroneTogether.zip from https://yellowafterlife.itch.io/nuclear-throne-together
notes:
Requires latest NuclearThroneTogether.zip from https://yellowafterlife.itch.io/nuclear-throne-together
Using wineexec seems to cause Mono issues during the installation phase.
"requires: nuclear-throne?revision=8362" should point to the Windows Steam Lutris entry (currently nuclear-throne-change-me)
content:
'---requires': nuclear-throne?revision=8362
files:
- file1:
    filename: NuclearThroneTogether.zip
    url: N/A:Select the latest NuclearThroneTogetherxxxx.zip
game:
  appid: 242680
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/
    file: $file1
    format: zip
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/NTT-Assemble.exe
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/wine
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR"; WINEPREFIX="$GAMEDIR/wine" wine "$GAMEDIR/NTT-Assemble.exe"
      "-assemble"
    disable_runtime: true
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/nuclearthrone.old.exe
    src: $GAMEDIR/nuclearthrone.exe
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/nuclearthrone.exe
    src: $GAMEDIR/NuclearThroneTogether.exe
